Everyone seems to have settled in quite nicely. A few kids still moved around but I think we're good for now.

God I missed them though. So much.

You know my oldest love blogs. could spend all day on them if we didn't set a limit. That being said, I couldn't tell you the details of how a simple thing like a computer work or anything. I saw Kirk and a couple of teammate and friend on this (and my son) and I figured i'd give it a try. Hi! My name's Doug Weight. Old geezer playing in the nhl and having the time of his life. disclaimer
